description: The code to identify the type of information documentID points to. Can be one of the following values - BOK (Booking - deprecated use BKG instead) - BKG (Booking) - SHI (Shipping Instruction) - VGM (Verified Gross Mass) - SRM (Shipment Release Message) - TRD (Transport Document) - ARN (Arrival Notice) Deprecated - use documentTypeCode instead
